title: Big Plays Spotlight: Akali’s reset party

replies.body: I'm more impressed by the Jarvin's quick thinking to trap someone in with baron and flashing out of his cataclysm to net the kill.

Yeah, the {{champion:59}} /{{champion:267}} lockdown to keep {{champion:53}}  and {{champion:60}} in the Baron pit and split the fight really gave {{champion:84}} the breathing room she needed to set up those first two kills

My favorite part was when {{champion:119}} was all like {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}  and then when {{champion:119}} used his {{champion:119}} and proceeded to {{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}} I was like {{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:119}}.

Something something something {{champion:84}} ... {{champion:119}}

Not {{champion:119}} ...

...{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} .
That's all that needs to be said. Exactly what the other Sherman will say when he starts playing League... Just the {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} wombo combo then TOUCHDOWN. Bam.
Other Sherman and I would be like {{champion:122}}  and {{champion:119}}
....I love the riot employees.....

And in the process, that poor slug was stepped on. He was just doing his own thing, living his life, achieving his dreams... and he got stepped on.

Life's hard for a slug.
i actually have to agree with that. koreans are scary mofos in league lol
She is easily countered by many champs, that's why they haven't touched her.

> She is easily countered by many champs, that's why they haven't touched her.

tell me a champ that counters her pls

{{champion:9}} caw caw caw

{{champion:24}} Oh you have jump kicks? Eat this lamp.

{{champion:82}} QWER BUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
That's not how Morde laughs.

When you ult someone with mordekaiser you hear BUAHAHAHAHAHA!

not HUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUE

listen really really closely you will hear the huehuehuehue 2 hours after hearing his ultimate if you leave the game on the victory screen after the match and you are in the bathroom with the lights off and facing the mirror at midnight

She has really weak pre 6 in lane with almost no poke or all in potential, in team fights she gets shut down by sweeping lenses or pink ward or any stealth reveled ability, she also have problem with disengaging, she can only go in with no ways of going out. If she gets ahead and focus the right target she is a really good assassin
but she is not reliable in many ways
Yup! Did you notice that the enemy team put a pink ward down after Blitz hooked Akali in?
iirc {{item:3364}}  only works on wards and traps, not champions.
You upgrade it at lvl 9 and then it can see stealth from champions.

A well played Fizz can shut her down early

Any tanky champion will prevent her from snowballing in lane.

Ziggs is really strong against her.

Lux is really strong against her.

Syndra is really strong against her.

Leblanc basically hard counters Akali even without the silence because she out bursts her and can trade with W and blink out before akali can even answer back.

Kayle beats her in lane for obvious reasons.

Lulu is extremely strong against her, so is Soraka (silences shut down Akali's trading potential.)

Malzahar destroys akali because he can constantly keep her under turret and at 6 if she tries to all in you then she will die to your combo.



Do I need to keep going?


Wards around the map to prevent her from getting easy kills from roaming (this is what most people fail at).

Always have pink wards/oracle lens in teamfights and then hard CC akali and blow her up the moment she goes in.
Without jungler presence Fizz has no chance against Akali in lane if Akali is not a noob.

{{champion:105}} can instanburst akali in lane EASY. He can farm so much easier then she can too and he has 2 aoe abilities if {{champion:84}} hides in her bubble.
It is a skill matchup, youre arguement is null and {{item:3135}}
So... How'd {{champion:84}}  get that many ult charges in a minute? 3 is the max? O.o...?
{{champion:84}} 's ult is like {{champion:55}} 's passive. when {{champion:84}} gets a kill or an assist she gets 1 charge of her ult
Just another day in Korean Bronze 5...
{{champion:84}}  is balanced.

Akali is extremely well balanced.

The enemy team messed up hard, especially that Zed. 

If Zed had stayed near his team, he probably still would've died but akali would've instantly died as well because her shroud wouldn't have saved her with all the pinks around the pit.

You not knowing how to play against her doesn't make her OP.
Lol if one person on that team saved a single pink ward {{item:2043}} that'd been a lot smoother.
They put a pink ward in the pit after Blitz landed his hook, but she got away. If only they had an extra.
Blitz is helping
Why are people qqing about akali when there are champs like braum jax kass. Akali isn't even played that much than those champs lol
braum is indeed op.  jax requires certain conditions to do well.  kassadin is an annoyance, but like a shaco, it requires skill and can be countered fairly well.
Someone understands
one of Akali's greatest strengths is she is rarely played so everyone forgets how to counter her. Those of us that play her like it that way:D.

Not that people forget, its just take a team to shut her down. Not having good team work and understand is what she needs to have a good game. Usually the teams blame mid for feeding and that's it, the reason its risky to play her higher up is that good teamwork is more common.

> Not that people forget, its just take a team to shut her down. Not having good team work and understand is what she needs to have a good game. Usually the teams blame mid for feeding and that's it, the reason its risky to play her higher up is that good teamwork is more common.

True, but often even if the team comes together and takes her out, they are fighting at low hp against the whole other team.  All Akali has to do is get adc to low health and her team can then clean up the kills easy.

Half says she's broken(not true before level 6,get a decent cs lead over her,understand how her abilities work and KNOW HOW NOT TO FEED..that zed gave her an escape after zonya)...all that aside that play may have been good on Akali's part but note the nami bubble stopping the cc on her and the J4 setting up the kills
Every god damn champ in this god damn epic game is op.
it's always the Koreans that get the highlights lol if I see one more highlight of them I'm moving to korea to get better at league (bronze 5 player commenting)
God tier Nami
It was a great pull by {{champion:53}} .
He's like....dang, I'm so glad I made that pull.
really funny when people cry about op and dont even know how a champ works :P
if you noticed how much her team actually helped her...{{champion:59}} {{champion:267}}

Lol, seriously?  The entire enemy team missed their crowd control, didn't get vision, and got split up by the Jarvan and Nami on Akali's team while tanking massive amounts of damage from baron.  Akali burned everything, flash, Zhonya's, all of her ult stacks, and barely lived after Nami used Crucible and Heal on her and you think that Akali is broken?  Let me know when you make it out of Wood VII.
That  {{champion:267}} play though.
That's pretty awesome. Baron steals / fights are the best. Always. C:
